name: HamsterBoy
description:
Hamsterboy went nuts and bought all the toilet paper to survive quarantine, but realized early that it doesn't help him at all. People are suffering from no supplies and now it's up to HamsterBoy to save the world!

Endless runner where you have to help society by shooting toilet paper and to survive the corona crisis!

How to play:

move left and right with arrow keys left and right or A and D

shoot toilet paper with up arrow, W, space or LMB

Still plenty of stuff to do, but I hope you guys enjoy it :)

Games was created by Pommelz and MaxiMelone
Special thanks to Forky for the art assets :)

environment, characters and sounds are licensed
